// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :   31  /01/2012 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  04  / 2012 
 
 
Subject :    Permission for access of vehicle up to the tarmac on medical 
                 grounds in respect of Dr.Karan Singh, President, Indian  
                 Council for Cultural Relations  
 
        
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.07/2011 dated 01/02/2011 on the 
subject cited above.  
 
      
Dr.Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural Relations is hereby 
permitted to take his own vehicle upto the tarmac during his departure / arrival by 
air at all airports in the country, on medical grounds for further  period of one year 
w.e.f 18/02/2012. 
 
                   This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil 
Aviation). 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
Copy to: 
 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri Ashok Kumar, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi.   : w.r.t  
                   MCA letter  No.AV.13024/37/2003-SS dated 20/01/2012 
2. 
      Sri M. Singh, Sr.Private Secretary, 127, Parliament House Annexe,  
            New Delhi-110 001
